Text:
How do u guys get these movies under 4GB?
I have been trying everything...
I have downloaded couple PS3-TEAMs movies and the quality is awesome but unfortunately i need subs....after burnin subs to the movie it comes 4.02GB :(

i would love to download this but im not 100% sure my blu ray player can play the codac (samsung)

it will play mkv and avi and most others no problem but i havent tryed this codac yet and its such a big file size i dont wanna waste bandwith trying, 

anyone with a samsung blu ray player been able to play this from usb stick?
update: this wouldnt play on my samsung bluray player from usb stick..... shame
This piece of shit is RIDDLED with glitches.  I can't believe it's still around, to be honest.
